title: After such hutment dweller has surrendered transit accommodation, if any, given to him / her, and has cleared all his / her dues to P
clause_text: After such hutment dweller has surrendered transit accommodation, if any, given to him / her, and has cleared all his / her dues to P.M.C. / P.C.M.C. / P.M.R.D.A. (Restricted to earlier P.C.N.T.D.A. area) / M.I.D.C. / M.H.A.D.A. / Government of Maharashtra.
